name: Kingdom Supercultures
headline: New foods with microbes
description: Kingdom Supercultures designs novel microbial cultures that make it easy for food manufacturers to create exciting new foods.  We've developed the world's first 0-calorie fermented sodas, beers with entirely new flavors, and novel plant-based dairy replacements.

founders.name: Kendall Dabaghi, Founder
founders.description: I'm a co-founder of Kingdom Supercultures.  Previously, I co-founded two consumer tech startups that were acquired by public companies (ArmorHub in 2014 and A Plus in 2016).  In my life I've dealt with a set of health issues related to my microbiome, and returned to Columbia in 2016 to develop expertise as a microbiome/machine learning researcher.  I deferred my PhD at MIT to co-found Kingdom in 2019.

founders.name: Ravi Sheth, Founder
founders.description: I'm a co-founder of Kingdom Supercultures. I received my PhD from Columbia supported by Hertz and NSF fellowships, and published 8+ first author papers in the microbiome and genomics fields (Science, Nature Biotech, Nature Methods, and more). I also spent time at the Bill & Melinda Gates foundation working on childhood malnutrition, and co-founded a edtech company in college (STEAMtrax) that was acquired by a public company.

[](https://kingdomsupercultures.com/<#>)
Kingdom creates and sells Superculture® ingredients
Superculture ingredients are a new class of ingredients invented by Kingdom to harness the untapped potential of natural microbes. Our ingredient portfolio focuses on functional ingredients for companion animals, which we deliver as live cultures or fermentates.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61b88f51d51d8e5b47cc2758/64dc59a71b62dc3a96afa3a8_homepage-hero-image.png)
[](https://kingdomsupercultures.com/<#first>)[](https://kingdomsupercultures.com/<#second>)[](https://kingdomsupercultures.com/<#third>)
How it works
Step 1: Isolate natural strains
We’ve isolated tens of thousands of novel, natural microbial strains already found in food, which we’ve extensively characterized with modern methods. This constitutes one of the largest and most comprehensive biobanks of food-borne microbial diversity in the world.
[learn more](https://kingdomsupercultures.com/</superculture-ingredients>)
How it works
STEP 2: Assemble new cultures
We combine cutting-edge automation and computation with groundbreaking analytical capacities to solve the “needle in a haystack” problem, and assemble our strains into Superculture® ingredients with unprecedented emergent functionalities.
[learn more](https://kingdomsupercultures.com/</superculture-ingredients>)
How it works
STEP 3: Enable innovative products
We sell Superculture® ingredients to innovative brands to deliver new functional benefits.
[learn more](https://kingdomsupercultures.com/</superculture-ingredients>)
# Kingdom creates and sells [Superculture**®** ingredients](https://kingdomsupercultures.com/</superculture-ingredients>)
## Superculture ingredients are a new class of ingredients invented by Kingdom to harness the untapped potential of natural microbes. Our ingredient portfolio focuses on functional ingredients for companion animals, which we deliver as live cultures or fermentates.
## How it works
Step 1: Isolate natural strains
We’ve isolated tens of thousands of novel, natural microbial strains already found in food, which we’ve extensively characterized with modern methods. This constitutes one of the largest and most comprehensive biobanks of food-borne microbial diversity in the world.
[LEARN MORE](https://kingdomsupercultures.com/</superculture-ingredients>)
STEP 2: Assemble new cultures
We combine cutting-edge automation and computation with groundbreaking analytical capacities to solve the “needle in a haystack” problem, and assemble our strains into Superculture® ingredients with unprecedented emergent functionalities.
[LEARN MORE](https://kingdomsupercultures.com/</superculture-ingredients>)
STEP 3: Enable innovative products
We sell Superculture® ingredients to innovative brands to deliver new functional benefits.
[LEARN MORE](https://kingdomsupercultures.com/</superculture-ingredients>)
How it works
[STEP 1: ISOLATION AND ANALYSIS](https://kingdomsupercultures.com/<#>)We isolate individual, natural microbial, strains from everyday products and use cutting-edge machine learning to run them through extensive analytics and processing. This allows us to gather rich, in-depth insights into how and why various products are successful (or not).
[Learn more ](https://kingdomsupercultures.com/</superculture-ingredients>)
How it works
[STEP 2: RE-ASSEMBLY & ITERATION](https://kingdomsupercultures.com/<#>)After our extensive analysis, we take these isolated strains and re-assemble them together into novel, never-before-seen combinations, or “Supercultures”.
[Learn more ](https://kingdomsupercultures.com/</superculture-ingredients>)
How it works
[STEP 3: innovatION](https://kingdomsupercultures.com/<#>)These novel Supercultures allow Manufacturers to create advanced, next-gen products with exciting functionalities that individual strains could never achieve alone. For instance: full-flavor wines & beers that are low alcohol. Rich & creamy yogurts and cheeses that are plant-based & dairy free. Effective personal care products that are free of artificial chemicals.
[Learn more ](https://kingdomsupercultures.com/</superculture-ingredients>)

## Kingdom’s purpose is to build a healthier food system by delivering new ingredients made with natural microbes
CAREERS

generated_description:
Kingdom Supercultures is a forward-thinking company in the food-tech space that has been shaking things up since its inception in 2019. Located in New York and part of the Y Combinator Batch S20, they’ve made it their mission to revolutionize food using the power of microbes. You might ask yourself, "Microbes? Really?" Well, they’re not just any microbes—they’re novel microbial cultures that help food manufacturers craft innovative edible creations.

Their offerings include the world’s first 0-calorie fermented sodas, unique beers bursting with new flavors, and plant-based dairy alternatives. Kingdom Supercultures specializes in what they call Superculture® ingredients—an exciting new class of ingredients designed to harness natural microbes. This range is especially aimed at enhancing the food experience for companion animals, delivering functional benefits through live cultures or fermentates.

Now, how does all this out-of-the-box innovation come to life? It starts with isolating tens of thousands of unique natural strains from food. With advanced automation and analytical techniques, they reassemble these microbes into Superculture blends that pack functionalities unlike anything currently available on the market. This means businesses can create next-gen products, such as lower-alcohol but full-flavor wines and yogurts that mimic the creaminess of dairy.

So far, they’ve made impressive strides, raising $25 million in Series A funding to expand their suite of non-GMO microbes and partnering with high-profile eateries like Eleven Madison Park for their plant-based menu. With a small but dedicated team of eight, including Group Partner Michael Seibel from Y Combinator, Kingdom Supercultures is set up for significant growth in an ever-evolving food landscape.

If you’re intrigued by the intersection of food and technology—or simply want to reach a new level of taste—check them out at [Kingdom Supercultures](https://kingdomsupercultures.com) and explore how their unique microbial innovations can elevate your food experiences.
